snippet.title: BONGIORNO SEES FASCISTS
snippet.content:
"Be thankful for the increased security measures, delays and inconvenience that are necessary to keep us safe from wannabe jihadis." But ABC commentator :
Panahi is not even an incipient fascist she's already the real thing. Scary as hell.
For a former priest, Bongiorno seems a great hater. Rather vicious.
